contents:
谷歌搜索页面的存档链接:https://web.archive.org/web/20190520180510/https://www.google.com/search?q=%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86+%E5%85%A8%E5%9F%8E%E6%96%AD%E7%BD%91&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-b-ab
小二帖的v2ex链接存档:https://web.archive.org/web/20190520180656/https://uk.v2ex.com/t/566017

各位遇到这种事情千万记得存档啊
附上wayback machine的一键存档说明:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help:Using_the_Wayback_Machine#To_save_a_live_page
archive.fo 的一键存档在首页有说明:https://archive.fo/
